citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care.
citations.narrative:
Three bottles of expired medications were identified during the inspection. One bottle of Buprenorphine expired on
5/25/25, one bottle of Sodium Bicarbonate expired 3/25, and one bottle of Lidocaine expired 3/25. Medication which has
expired can lose efficacy and does not meet the standard of care. The facility must either dispose of all such medications
or store them in an appropriately labeled, physically separate location from non-expired medications. The medication was
disposed of at time of the inspection.
********Corrected at the time of inspection on 6/3/25
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
n

narrative:
2.33(b)(2) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care. 
Three bottles of expired medications were identified during the inspection. One bottle of Buprenorphine expired on 
5/25/25, one bottle of Sodium Bicarbonate expired 3/25, and one bottle of Lidocaine expired 3/25. Medication which has 
expired can lose efficacy and does not meet the standard of care. The facility must either dispose of all such medications 
or store them in an appropriately labeled, physically separate location from non-expired medications. The medication was 
disposed of at time of the inspection. 
********Corrected at the time of inspection on 6/3/25 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
